Description: Fragment of rim of Attic black-figured pottery column-krater. Outside of neck glazed; frieze of six- or seven-stroke vertical zig-zags on outside of rim; black-figure animal frieze on top: to left, rear of feline to left; central, goat browsing to right; on the right, front part of panther to left; added red for details; inside of neck glazed with broad red band at top.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2201)
